metadata.title: IBeanThere
metadata.description: Discover local cafes, log your coffee visits, and share your experiences

navigation.my_beans_description: Track your coffee bean growth at each cafe

heatmap.title: My Coffee Road
heatmap.subtitle: See your coffee journey on a map

hero.title: Track Your Local Cafes,<mobileBr></mobileBr> One Bean at a Time
hero.subtitle: Mark your favorite local spots<mediumBr></mediumBr> and help build a community<mobileBr></mobileBr> coffee map together.

features.title: Your Complete Coffee Companion
features.subtitle: Everything you need to discover, record, and share your coffee journey

discover.title: Discover Hidden Gems
discover.description: Find the best local cafes around you, from cozy corners to bustling roasteries.

record.title: Log Your Moments
record.description: Capture tasting notes, photos, and ratings to build your personal coffee archive.

share.title: Build the Map Together
share.description: Share your local favorites to help complete the cafe map for everyone.

growth_journey.title: Your Visits Build a Forest
growth_journey.subtitle: Watch your beans grow with every cup

seed.title: The Seed
seed.description: First Visit - A single bean planted in fertile soil.

sprout.title: The Sprout
sprout.description: Revisit - New life emerges as you return.

tree.title: The Tree
tree.description: Regular - Roots run deep, branches reach high.

harvest.title: The Harvest
harvest.description: Loyalist - Bearing fruit, a testament to your journey.

user_personas.title: What Kind of Explorer Are You?
user_personas.subtitle: Find your coffee identity

navigator.title: The Navigator
navigator.description: The Pioneer. You venture where no one has been, marking new territories on the map.

archivist.title: The Archivist
archivist.description: The Historian. You capture the fleeting essence of every cup, preserving memories.

curator.title: The Curator
curator.description: The Guide. You weave experiences into collections, sharing the best paths with others.

cta.title: Ready to Plant Your First Bean?
cta.subtitle: Start documenting your coffee adventures and watch your personal coffee forest grow
cta.disclaimer: "60 beans make a cup of coffee, and they give me 60 good ideas." - Beethoven

browser_guide.chrome_step1: Click the <icon>info</icon> icon next to the URL

browser_guide.edge_step1: Click the lock icon üîí in the address bar

shop.hero_subtitle_line1: A subtle signal only people who truly love coffee and cafes

essentials.title: Cafe Nomad Essentials
essentials.subtitle: Practical items for those who work and relax in cafes.

explorer.title: Explorer & Collector
explorer.subtitle: Items that foster a sense of belonging, linked to the Founding Crew system.

gift.title: Gift Packages
gift.subtitle: Perfect compositions for gifting to friends.

tumbler.title: Sleek Reusable Tumbler
tumbler.desc: Minimalist design with matte black/white base. Leak-proof for your bag.

pouch.title: Laptop/iPad Pouch
pouch.desc: Water-resistant material strong against coffee stains. 'Work from Cafe' design.

ecobag.title: Tyvek Eco Bag
ecobag.desc: Lightweight and durable Tyvek material. Kraft paper texture with logo point.

keyring.title: Map Marker Keyring
keyring.desc: Map pin shaped keyring. Show off your Navigator/Vanguard status.

passport.title: Cafe Passport Note
passport.desc: Analog note for stamps and stickers. Record your journey physically.

stickers.title: Removable Sticker Pack
stickers.desc: Decorate your laptop and tumbler. 'Verified Cafe', 'Coffee Lover' graphics.

hoodie.title: Heavyweight Hoodie
hoodie.desc: Comfortable fit for cafe hopping. 'Support Your Local Cafe' slogan on back.

cap.title: Vintage Ball Cap
cap.desc: Deep fit cap with coffee bean embroidery. Washed vintage color.

dripbag.title: IBeanThere Selection Drip Bag
dripbag.desc: Curated drip bags from top-rated roasteries on the platform.

coaster.title: Map Coaster
coaster.desc: Diatomaceous earth or leather. Map design that completes with a cup.

legal.disclaimer_translation: This translation is provided for convenience only. In case of any discrepancy between this version and the English version, the English version shall prevail.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content:
We value your feedback and are here to help.

For any questions about our Terms of Service, Privacy Policy, or if you need assistance with the IBeanThere app, please do not hesitate to contact our support team.

Email: ibeanthere.app@gmail.com

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: Welcome to IBeanThere. These Terms of Service ("Terms") constitute a legally binding agreement between you and IBeanThere ("we," "us," or "our"). By accessing or using our mobile application and services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these terms, pleaes do not use our services.

account.title: 2. User Accounts & Security
account.content: To access certain features, you must create an account. You agree to provide accurate, current, and complete information. You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. We reserve the right to disable any user account if we believe you have violated these Terms.

content.title: 3. User Content & License
content.content: Our service allows you to post reviews, photos, and other content. You retain ownership of your content. However, by posting, you grant IBeanThere a perpetual, irrevocable, worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, copy, reproduce, process, adapt, modify, publish, transmit, display, and distribute any such content in any media or distribution methods now known or later developed.

conduct.title: 4. Prohibited Conduct
conduct.content: You agree not to: (i) use the service for any illegal purpose; (ii) harass, abuse, or harm another person; (iii) reverse engineer, decompile, or attempt to extract the source code of the software; (iv) use any robot, spider, or automated device to access the service; (v) interfere with the proper working of the service.

location.title: 5. Location Services
location.content: Some features of our app require access to your device's location. You can control these permissions through your device settings. We use location data to provide local cafe recommendations and verify visits. By using these features, you consent to such usage as described in our Privacy Policy.

termination.title: 6. Termination
termination.content: We may suspend or terminate your access to the service at any time, without prior notice or liability, for any reason whatsoever, including without limitation if you breach these Terms. Upon termination, your right to use the Service will immediately cease.

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.content: TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY APPLICABLE LAW (INCLUDING THE CONSUMER PROTECTION ACT OF ONTARIO), IBEANTHERE SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION, LOSS OF PROFITS, DATA, USE, GOODWILL, OR OTHER INTANGIBLE LOSSES, RESULTING FROM YOUR ACCESS TO OR USE OF OR INABILITY TO ACCESS OR USE THE SERVICE. OUR TOTAL LIABILITY SHALL NOT EXCEED THE AMOUNT YOU PAID US, IF ANY, IN THE PAST SIX MONTHS OR 50 CAD, WHICHEVER IS GREATER.

dispute.title: 8. Dispute Resolution & Arbitration
dispute.content: ANY DISPUTE, CLAIM OR CONTROVERSY ARISING OUT OF OR RELATING TO THESE TERMS OR THE BREACH, TERMINATION, ENFORCEMENT, INTERPRETATION OR VALIDITY THEREOF SHALL BE DETERMINED BY BINDING ARBITRATION ON AN INDIVIDUAL BASIS. YOU AND IBEANTHERE WAIVE THE RIGHT TO A TRIAL BY JURY OR TO PARTICIPATE IN A CLASS ACTION.

governing_law.title: 9. Governing Law
governing_law.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the Province of Ontario and the federal laws of Canada applicable therein, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

changes.title: 10. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. If a revision is material, we will try to provide at least 30 days' notice prior to any new terms taking effect. By continuing to access or use our Service after those revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms.

contact.title: 11. Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at ibeanthere.app@gmail.com.

intro.title: 1. Introduction
intro.content: IBeanThere respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our mobile application and website. Before registering, submitting any content, or otherwise engaging with us, please read and understand this Privacy Policy as well as our Terms of Service. In the course of engaging with us, you may also use third party's intellectual property, tools or resources (e.g., Supabase, Google Analytics), and such third party's privacy policy may also apply to you.

sections.personal_text: We collect information you provide directly to us, such as your name, email address, username, password, and coffee preferences when you register or update your profile.
sections.location_text: With your consent, we collect precise geolocation data to show you nearby cafes, verify 'Drop Bean' actions, and maintain your 'Navigator' status.
sections.usage_text: When you use our Services, we collect certain information by automated means, such as through server log files, cookies, web beacons (also known as clear GIFs and pixel tags), and embedded scripts. This may include your IP address, device type and model, operating system version, browser type and version, time zone setting, unique device identifiers, and information on actions taken within the app.

public_info.title: 3. Public Information
public_info.content: Certain information you provide is public by default. Your username is always publicly visible and searchable. Content you post, such as cafe reviews, ratings, photos, and comments, are available to the public by default. We recommend that you do not use your real name as your username if you wish to remain anonymous. Any information disclosed in public areas becomes public information, and you should exercise caution before sharing.

use.title: 4. How We Use Your Information
use.content: We use the information we collect to: (i) provide, maintain, and improve our services; (ii) personalize your experience and coffee recommendations; (iii) process your transactions and manage your account; (iv) communicate with you about updates, security alerts, and support; (v) monitor and analyze trends and usage; (vi) send you periodic communications relating to our Services, subject to your communication preferences.

sharing.title: 5. Disclosure of Information
sharing.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share information with: (i) service providers who perform services on our behalf (e.g., cloud hosting, analytics, email transmission), subject to confidentiality obligations; (ii) to comply with legal obligations; (iii) to protect and defend our rights and property; (iv) with your consent or at your direction. Notwithstanding any other sections of this Privacy Policy, Company shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with third parties' privacy policies.

third_party_info.title: 6. Information About Others
third_party_info.content: You can choose to provide us with information relating to third parties, including their names, email addresses, or other contact details. If you use any feature of the Services that allows you to communicate or share information with third parties, you acknowledge and agree that you have the authority to access and use the relevant data and that you have notified these third parties and informed them how their information is collected and used by Company to provide the Services.

anti_spam.title: 7. Anti-Spam (CASL Compliance)
anti_spam.content: Where applicable, we will seek your express consent to contact you, including by way of commercial electronic messages. You can unsubscribe at any time from receiving commercial electronic messages by following the instructions in the message. Even if you have opted out of receiving marketing communications from us, please be aware that we may still contact you for other purposes, such as providing communications you have consented to receive, or regarding the products or services we provide to you.

children.title: 8. Children's Online Privacy Protection
children.content: The Website and Services are not intended for use by persons under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect or use any Personal Information from any persons under 13 years of age. If we become aware that we have unknowingly collected Personal Information from a child under the age of 13, we will make commercially reasonable efforts to delete such Personal Information from our database.

international.title: 9. International Transfers
international.content: Your Personal Information may be stored, processed or otherwise used by us, our affiliates or our service providers, both inside and outside of Canada (including the United States). As a result, that country's courts, governments or law enforcement agencies could obtain disclosure of your information in accordance with that country's laws. Whenever we hire other organizations to provide support services, they will be required to conform to our privacy standards and to allow us to audit them for compliance.

security.title: 10. Data Security
security.content: We take all reasonable steps to protect the security and confidentiality of your Personal Information. We protect Personal Information within our custody or control with appropriate organizational, technological and physical safeguards. We store Personal Information in electronic and physical files that are secure, and our security measures include secure on-site and off-site storage, restricted access to records and data processing equipment, password protocols, and encryption and security software. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.

retention.title: 11. Data Retention
retention.content: We only retain Personal Information for as long as is necessary for the purpose for which it was collected. When we no longer are required to retain the information, we will destroy, erase, or de-identify the information. Legal requirements, however, may require us to retain some or all of the Personal Information we hold for a period of time that is longer than that for which we might otherwise hold.

rights.title: 12. Your Data Rights
rights.content: Depending on your location, you may have rights under laws like GDPR, CCPA, or PIPEDA. These may include the right to access, correct, delete, or port your personal data. You may update or correct your account information by editing your account settings or by sending a request to us. To exercise these rights, please contact us at ibeanthere.app@gmail.com.

changes.title: 13. Changes to Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may amend this Privacy Policy from time to time as we add new products and services, as we improve our current offerings, and as technologies change. If we make a change to this Privacy Policy, this will be reflected in the above Last Update date. We encourage you to check back periodically. If we make any material or substantive changes in this Privacy Policy, we will notify you by posting a clear and conspicuous notice of these changes on the Website and in this Privacy Policy.

contact.title: 14. Contact Us
contact.content: Any questions, comments or concerns relating to this Privacy Policy, and any requests to correct or access Personal Information collected during your use of the Services, should be directed to us at: Email: ibeanthere.app@gmail.com
